resources.string:
v4 (401) 
• New big feature: A Timer! Comes in handy, if you forgot your remote shutter release at home. (Or when it fell in the water…) 
• Prettified the settings menu. Material ftw!


v3 (303) 
• Some tiny UI refinements and other under-the-hood enhancements


v3 (302) 
• Landscape mode! 
• Added this changelog dialog. 
• Fix: The filter factor is now only allowed to be ≥ 1. A filter can't really increase the amount of light.


v3 (301) – initial release 
Version 3 is my third iteration in writing this app. A complete re-write! A different, better user interface! Performance first! More features than ever! And ultimately the first version that is openly available.
